channel.title: Recolouring
channel.description: Hi uhm i need help recoulering armor and whips please help me and if therem is a code pleas tell me where to put it thanks

item.title: Recolouring
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

off topic: James he wasn’t wrong. He said it is client side and wrong section, he is right.

On topic: For a simple recolor do this:

if(i == ####) // item id" { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 28; // colors, change if you want. Currently set to color "red" class8.anIntArray156[0] = 74; // colors, change if you want. Currently set to color "red" class8.anIntArray160[0] = 38676; // colors, change if you want. Currently set to color "red" class8.anIntArray160[0] = 926; // colors, change if you want. Currently set to color "red" class8.anInt174 = 4671; //Model ID class8.anInt181 = 490;//Model Zoom class8.anInt190 = 344;//Model Rotation class8.anInt198 = 192;//Unknown class8.anInt204 = 138;//Unknown class8.anInt199 = -1;//noteable class8.anInt169 = 1;//Unknown class8.anInt194 = 20;//Unknown class8.anInt165 = 4672;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 4672;//female wearing class8.anInt175 = 56;//Unknown class8.anInt197 = 116;//Unknown class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Item Name";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "examine info.".getBytes();//examin info }

This goes in class8.java

Read full topic
